title: Desperately need Bronze - Silver support main
body:
I've put a lot of effort into maining ADC but i feel like it goes to waste because i get well tbh a bad support which i know seems like a bad excuse and seems like im whining but i know if i had a good support we could possible climb very high
I don't want to be stuck in bronze because im too scared to play adc due to the fact the enemy blitz will shit on me.

replies.body: I don't do to bad but if you wanna hit a game with me I normally play a great Morgana support 80% something win rate with jer

Man, I completely feel your pain. I main support and I am sick and tired of the constant crappy ADCs in bronze. I've sent you a friend request in the game client, we'll play a few norms first and see how we get along. ^_^
-Traloop

I think someone on these boards said that 95% of oce can't support. So true. I've watched some of the top ranked games and every now and then you still see a noob.

But laugh when bronzers take blitz, he's the most useless **support** at that elo. All blitzes are heroes and try to carry.

IGN: Lemon and Carrot
If u want a sup i'll use my friends acc
